title.narrative: LEGISLATION, POLICIES, AND PLANS

description.narrative: Improved policies, legislation and systems for equitable access and completion of quality and inclusive basic education., which contributes to Early Learning, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning Outcomes, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2016, South Sudan is on course to achieve universal participation and increased and equitable completion of quality primary education with parity among boys and girls.

title.narrative: National policies formulated with stakeholder leadership for each of the following areas: a) Girls Education, b) Assessment and Examination, c) Curriculum, d) Early ,Learning, e) Special needs education, f) School leadership

actual.value: 2015:2 completed: Girls' Education Strategy, and the National Education Curriculum Framework (ECD, Primary, Alternative Education, Secondary, TVET)
